Updated the button backgrounds to match the "Confirm Timeline" button in page1.

## Changes Made:

1. **Page 2** (`app/upload-contacts/page.tsx`):
   - Updated the "Cancel" button from gray (`bg-gray-200`) to `bg-[#305669]` with white text and hover state `hover:bg-[#244a5a]`
   - The "Confirm" button already had the correct color

2. **Page 3** (`app/view-chronicle/page.tsx`):
   - Updated the "Export CSV" button from teal (`bg-[#8ABEB9]`) to `bg-[#305669]` with white text and hover state `hover:bg-[#244a5a]`

All buttons now match the "Confirm Timeline" button styling:
- Background color: `#305669`
- Text color: white
- Hover state: `#244a5a`

No linting errors. The buttons now have consistent styling across all pages.

Updated the background color to `#F4E9D7` in both locations:

1. **`app/globals.css`**: Updated the CSS variable `--background` from `#EAEBD0` to `#F4E9D7`
2. **`app/layout.tsx`**: Updated the main element's background class from `bg-[#EAEBD0]` to `bg-[#F4E9D7]`

The background color is now `#F4E9D7` across all pages. No linting errors were found. The change will apply throughout the application since the CSS variable is used by the body element and the Tailwind class is applied to the main content area.
